verses.verse: Now these are they that came <WH935> to David <WH1732> to Ziklag <WH6860>, while he yet kept himself close <WH6113> because <WH6440> of Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027>: and they were among the mighty men <WH1368>, helpers <WH5826> of the war <WH4421>.

They were armed <WH5401> with bows <WH7198>, and could use both the right hand <WH3231> and the left <WH8041> in hurling stones <WH68> and shooting arrows <WH2671> out of a bow <WH7198>, they were of Saul <WH7586>'s brothers <WH251> of Benjamin <WH1144>.

The chief <WH7218> was Ahiezer <WH295>, then Joash <WH3101>, the sons <WH1121> of Shemaah <WH8094> the Gibeathite <WH1395>; and Jeziel <WH3149>, and Pelet <WH6404>, the sons <WH1121> of Azmaveth <WH5820>; and Berachah <WH1294>, and Jehu <WH3058> the Antothite <WH6069>,

And Ismaiah <WH3460> the Gibeonite <WH1393>, a mighty man <WH1368> among the thirty <WH7970>, and over the thirty <WH7970>; and Jeremiah <WH3414>, and Jahaziel <WH3166>, and Johanan <WH3110>, and Josabad <WH3107> the Gederathite <WH1452>,
Eluzai <WH498>, and Jerimoth <WH3406>, and Bealiah <WH1183>, and Shemariah <WH8114>, and Shephatiah <WH8203> the Haruphite <WH2741>,
Elkanah <WH511>, and Jesiah <WH3449>, and Azareel <WH5832>, and Joezer <WH3134>, and Jashobeam <WH3434>, the Korhites <WH7145>,
And Joelah <WH3132>, and Zebadiah <WH2069>, the sons <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395> of Gedor <WH1446>.

And of the Gadites <WH1425> there separated <WH914> themselves unto David <WH1732> into the hold <WH4679> to the wilderness <WH4057> men <WH1368> of might <WH2428>, and men <WH582> of war <WH6635> fit for the battle <WH4421>, that could handle <WH6186> shield <WH6793> and shield <WH7420>, whose faces <WH6440> were like the faces <WH6440> of lions <WH738>, and were as swift <WH4116> as the roes <WH6643> upon the mountains <WH2022>;
Ezer <WH5829> the first <WH7218>, Obadiah <WH5662> the second <WH8145>, Eliab <WH446> the third <WH7992>,
Mishmannah <WH4925> the fourth <WH7243>, Jeremiah <WH3414> the fifth <WH2549>,
Attai <WH6262> the sixth <WH8345>, Eliel <WH447> the seventh <WH7637>,
Johanan <WH3110> the eighth <WH8066>, Elzabad <WH443> the ninth <WH8671>,
Jeremiah <WH3414> the tenth <WH6224>, Machbanai <WH4344> the eleventh <WH6249>.

These were of the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410>, captains <WH7218> of the army <WH6635>: one <WH259> of the least <WH6996> was over a hundred <WH3967>, and the greatest <WH1419> over a thousand <WH505>.

These are they that went over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, when it had overflown <WH4390> all his banks <WH1415>; and they put to flight <WH1272> all them of the valleys <WH6010>, both toward the east <WH4217>, and toward the west <WH4628>.
And there came <WH935> of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> and Judah <WH3063> to the hold <WH4679> unto David <WH1732>.

And David <WH1732> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH6440> them <WH6030>, and answered and said <WH559> unto them <WH935>, If you be come peaceably <WH7965> unto me to help <WH5826> me <WH3824>, my heart shall be knit <WH3162> unto you <WH7411>: but if you be come to betray me to my enemies <WH6862>, seeing there is no <WH3808> wrong <WH2555> in my hands <WH3709>, the God <WH430> of our fathers <WH1> look <WH7200> on it <WH3198>, and rebuke it.

Then the spirit <WH7307> came <WH3847> upon Amasai <WH6022>, who was chief <WH7218> of the captains <WH7970>, and he said <WH1732>, Yours are we, David, and on your side <WH1121>, you son of Jesse <WH3448>: peace <WH7965>, peace <WH7965> be unto you <WH7965>, and peace be to your helpers <WH5826>; for your God <WH430> helps <WH5826> you <WH1732>. Then David received <WH6901> them <WH5414>, and made them captains <WH7218> of the band <WH1416>.

And there fell <WH5307> some of Manasseh <WH4519> to David <WH1732>, when he came <WH935> with the Philistines <WH6430> against Saul <WH7586> to battle <WH4421>: but they helped <WH5826> them not <WH5633>: for the lords of the Philistines <WH6430> upon advisement <WH6098> sent <WH7971> him away <WH559>, saying, He will fall <WH5307> to his master <WH113> Saul <WH7586> to the jeopardy of our heads <WH7218>.

As he went <WH3212> to Ziklag <WH6860>, there fell <WH5307> to him of Manasseh <WH4519>, Adnah <WH5734>, and Jozabad <WH3107>, and Jediael <WH3043>, and Michael <WH4317>, and Jozabad <WH3107>, and Elihu <WH453>, and Zilthai <WH6769>, captains <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> that were of Manasseh <WH4519>.
And they helped <WH5826> David <WH1732> against the band <WH1416> of the rovers <WH1368>: for they were all mighty men of valor <WH2428>, and were captains <WH8269> in the army <WH6635>.
For at that time <WH6256> day <WH3117> by day <WH3117> there came <WH935> to David <WH1732> to help <WH5826> him <WH1419>, until it was a great army <WH4264>, like the army <WH4264> of God <WH430>.

And these are the numbers <WH4557> of the bands <WH7218> that were ready armed <WH2502> to the war <WH6635>, and came <WH935> to David <WH1732> to Hebron <WH2275>, to turn <WH5437> the kingdom <WH4438> of Saul <WH7586> to him <WH6310>, according to the word of the Lord <WH3068>.

The sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> that bore <WH5375> shield <WH6793> and spear <WH7420> were six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> and eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967>, ready armed <WH2502> to the war <WH6635>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095>, mighty men <WH1368> of valor <WH2428> for the war <WH6635>, seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> and one hundred <WH3967>.
Of the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>.
And Jehoiada <WH3077> was the leader <WH5057> of the Aaronites <WH175>, and with him were three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967>;
And Zadok <WH6659>, a young man <WH5288> mighty <WH1368> of valor <WH2428>, and of his father <WH1>'s house <WH1004> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> captains <WH8269>.

And of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>, the relatives <WH251> of Saul <WH7586>, three <WH7969> thousand <WH505>: for until now the greatest <WH4768> part of them had kept <WH8104> the custody <WH4931> of the house <WH1004> of Saul <WH7586>.

And of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> and eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967>, mighty <WH1368> men <WH582> of valor <WH2428>, famous <WH8034> throughout the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>.
And of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519> eighteen <WH8083> thousand <WH505>, which were expressed <WH5344> by name <WH8034>, to come <WH935> and make David <WH1732> king <WH4427>.

And of the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485>, which were men that had understanding <WH998> of the times <WH6256>, to know <WH3045> what Israel <WH3478> should do <WH6213>; the heads <WH7218> of them were two hundred <WH3967>; and all their brothers <WH251> were at their commandment <WH6310>.

Of Zebulun <WH2074>, such as went forth <WH3318> to battle <WH6635>, expert <WH6186> in war <WH4421>, with all instruments <WH3627> of war <WH4421>, fifty <WH2572> thousand <WH505>, which could keep command <WH5737>: they were not of double <WH3820> heart <WH3820>.
And of Naphtali <WH5321> a thousand <WH505> captains <WH8269>, and with them with shield <WH6793> and spear <WH2595> thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505>.
And of the Danites <WH1839> expert <WH6186> in war <WH4421> twenty <WH6242> and eight <WH8083> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>.
And of Asher <WH836>, such as went forth <WH3318> to battle <WH6635>, expert <WH6186> in war <WH4421>, forty <WH705> thousand <WH505>.

And on the other side <WH5676> of Jordan <WH3383>, of the Reubenites <WH7206>, and the Gadites <WH1425>, and of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519>, with all manner of instruments <WH3627> of war <WH6635> for the battle <WH4421>, an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505>.

All these men <WH582> of war <WH4421>, that could keep <WH5737> command <WH4634>, came <WH935> with a perfect <WH8003> heart <WH3820> to Hebron <WH2275>, to make David <WH1732> king <WH4427> over all Israel <WH3478>: and all the rest <WH7611> also of Israel <WH3478> were of one <WH259> heart <WH3824> to make David <WH1732> king <WH4427>.
And there they were with David <WH1732> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>, eating <WH398> and drinking <WH8354>: for their brothers <WH251> had prepared for them <WH3559>.

Moreover they that were near <WH7138> them <WH3485>, even unto Issachar and Zebulun <WH2074> and Naphtali <WH5321>, brought <WH935> bread <WH3899> on donkeys <WH2543>, and on camels <WH1581>, and on mules <WH6505>, and on oxen <WH1241>, and food <WH3978>, meal <WH7058>, cakes <WH1690> of figs <WH6778>, and bunches of raisins, and wine <WH3196>, and oil <WH8081>, and oxen <WH1241>, and sheep <WH6629> abundantly <WH7230>: for there was joy <WH8057> in Israel <WH3478>.
